title: Introduction and Overview
description: Welcome to the documentation site for @deepbag/react-grid-x. This library offers a powerful and customizable table component built with React and TypeScript. Whether you're building a complex data grid or a simple table, this library will help you organize and present your data with ease.

title: Installation
description: To use @deepbag/react-grid-x in your React project, follow these simple steps to install and set up the library. npm install @deepbag/react-grid-x --force
